{{Wireless embedded system |brand=EnGenius |model=ECB350 |revision=v1 |upc=655216005426 |asin=B007OWY6P2 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=Senao |est_release_date=03/26/2013 |fcc_date=01/11/2012 |fcc_id=A8J-ECB350 |ic_id=10103A-ECB350 |pcb_id=7016A0511001 |type=bridge |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR7242 |cpu1_cspeed=400 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L6406EM2I-12G |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM6AA160TSB-5G |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9283 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Atheros |eth_chip2_model=AR8035-A |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;RFMD;RF5602;RF, 5602, BW4D;2;,,, 802.3af PoE Powered Device Controller;TI;TPS2375;;1;,,, 150V, 4.1A N-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild;FDS2582;;1;,,, Wide-Input Synchronous Buck Controller;TI;TPS40060;;1;,,, 60V P-Channel MOSFET;Analog Power;AM30P06-45D;;1;,,, 2A, 2V Non-Synchronous Buck Converter;Texas Instruments;TPS54231;;1;,,, |flags=high power |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:02:6F, |oui_eth=00:02:6F, }} {{TagLine|11N Long Range Multi-Function Gigabit Client Bridge}} :[http://www.engeniusnetworks.com/product/product.php?c=10&s=24&p=73 Product page (engeniusnetworks)] {{•}} [http://www.engeniustech.com/business-networking/indoor-access-points-client-bridges/16342-ecb350-new Product page (engeniustech)] {{•}} [http://www.engeniustech.com/resources/ECB350-UM-20120222.pdf Manual]
"7016A0511001" and "V1.00" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
===Specifications=== Specs, per '''EnGenius''''s product page, follow.. <small> *'''Transmit Power''' **802.11b: 29dBm @ all rates **802.11g ***29dBm @ 6Mbps ***29dBm @ 9Mbps ***28dBm @ 12Mbps ***28dBm @ 18Mbps ***24dBm @ 24Mbps ***24dBm @ 36Mbps ***23dBm @ 48Mbps ***23dBm @ 54Mbps **802.11n ***26dBm @ MCS0/MCS8 ***26dBm @ MCS1/MCS9 ***25dBm @ MCS2/MCS10 ***25dBm @ MCS3/MCS11 ***24dBm @ MCS4/MCS12 ***24dBm @ MCS4/MCS12 ***24dBm @ MCS5/MCS13 ***23dBm @ MCS6/MCS14 ***23dBm @ MCS7/MCS15 *'''Receiver Sensitivity''' **802.11b: best ≤ -98 dBm **802.11g: best ≤ -93 dBm **802.11n: best ≤ -93 dBm </small>
==Images== <gallery caption="from EnGenius"> Image:EnGenius_ECB350_main.jpg|main Image:EnGenius_ECB350_back_ports.jpg|back, ports </gallery> [[Has images::external| ]] ---- <gallery> File:EnGenius ECB350 Top.jpeg|Board Top File:EnGenius ECB350 Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]] ---- [[Has images::internal| ]]
